title: I need your questions! (STUDENT SPECIAL)
description: In this short episode, I ask for your questions. You can ask anything about Sociology no matter how simple or complex you think the question is. Please send your questions to thesociologyshowpodcast@gmail.com
itunes:author: Matthew Wilkin
itunes:subtitle: In this short episode, I ask for your questions. You can ask anything about Sociology no matter how simple or complex you think the question is. Please send your questions to thesociologyshowpodcast@gmail.com
